name: search_kroger_products
description: Searches the Kroger product catalog for an item in a specific location.

search_term.description: The name of the product to search for, e.g., 'milk', 'coffee'.

zip_code.description: The 5-digit US zip code of the desired store location.

name: schedule_reminder
description: Schedules a reminder for a task at a specific time.

task.description: The task to be reminded about, e.g., 'Buy milk'.

time.description: The specific time for the reminder, e.g., 'tomorrow morning' or '3 PM'.
